intro: Welcome to the MyBodyScan demo! Here's how a typical check-in feels.

messages.message: Coach, what should I focus on this month?
messages.reply: Keep chasing consistent protein (~0.8-1.0g per lb), three strength sessions, and 10-12k steps. We'll reassess in two weeks.

messages.message: Nutrition has been okay but weekends are tough.
messages.reply: Block time for meal prep on Friday, keep protein-forward snacks handy, and log one weekend day so we can spot trends.
Keep two 20-minute Zone 2 sessions for recovery and add a short interval ride if energy is high. Prioritize sleep before stacking extra work.
